Wancheng district of Nanyang city 南陽|南阳[Nan2 yang2], Henan

sentences.english: His concubine, Lady Liu, was the mother of Cao Ang, who had died in Wancheng during the campaign against Zhang Xiu.
sentences.chinese: 妾刘氏生子曹昂，因征张绣时死于宛城。

sentences.english: Radicals of the Yellow Scarves Rebellion were packed together like turtles in a jar and appeared to be in great disarray.
sentences.chinese: 眼看宛城被围，黄巾军如瓮中之鳖一样，军心大乱。
